body: LOLLLL Triggered so  much  that  you cant express your anger in one comment LOL  READ what I wrote again  U RETARD I said "while my dog fucks your slut of a mother's rotten cunt"  I didn't say I would fuck your mom, hell I wouldn't touch that rotten, oozy, shit smelling cunt with a ten feet pole LOL.
